formatDescription: FBX is a 3D file format developed by Kaydara and owned by Autodesk since 2006. It is used to provide interoperability between 3D digital content creation applications. FBX has a text based (ASCII, this signature) and a binary version.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
